titles.title: Of inquiry requesting the President to transmit certain documents to the House of Representatives relating to the use of authorities, personnel, and capabilities of the intelligence community to conduct domestic activities unrelated to foreign intelligence.

Of inquiry requesting the President to transmit certain documents to the House of Representatives relating to the use of authorities, personnel, and capabilities of the intelligence community to conduct domestic activities unrelated to foreign intelligence.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Intelligence (Permanent Select).
Reported by the Committee on Intelligence. H. Rept. 117-621.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 162.

bill.summary: This resolution requests the President to provide the House of Representatives any documents and information about the use of authorities, personnel, and capabilities of the intelligence community to conduct domestic activities unrelated to foreign intelligence.
